title: Cindy Crawford and Kaia Gerber show their model styles as they head out on the town in New York
text:
They are the most famous mother and daughter models in the world.

And on Thursday evening, Cindy Crawford and Kaia Gerber stepped out together in New York for a night on the town.

A little R&R was in order as earlier in the day they'd taken part in the Vogue: Forces Of Fashion event at Spring Studios in Tribeca.

Model style: Cindy Crawford and Kaia Gerber stepped out together in New York for a night on the town on Thursday

Cindy led the way as they headed to their waiting vehicle.

The supermodel, 53, looked stylish in a black tuxedo-style pant suit and sandal heels.

Her long brunette locks were blown out for volume and she accessorized with diamond earrings and a diamond bracelet.

Kaia, 18, opted for a very leggy look, wearing a black mini dress with a buttoned up deep red jacket and strappy heels.

The teen's chin-length bob was sleekly styled and she added a diamond necklace to complete her look.

Good genes: Cindy, 53, looked stylish in a black tuxedo-style pant suit. Her long brunette locks were blown out for volume and accessorized with diamond earrings and bracelet

Sleek: Kaia, 18, opted for a very leggy look, wearing a black mini dress with a buttoned up deep red jacket and strappy heels. The teen added a diamond necklace to complete her look

The modeling duo had been more business-like in their fashion choices at the Vogue event Thursday.

The mother and daughter combination definitely turned heads as they arrived at the star-studded event at Spring Studios in the Big Apple.

Cindy donned a blue gray pant suit which featured a blazer tied with a sash.

She added strappy black stiletto heels and accessorized with large brown designer shades.

All business: Cindy and Kaia had suited up as they headed to the Vogue: Forces Of Fashion event in New York City on Thursday

Influencers: They were joined by Vogue editor-in-chief Anna Wintour

On the go: Cindy definitely turned heads as she arrived at the star-studded event at Spring Studios in Tribeca

On point: Cindy donned a blue gray pant suit which featured a blazer tied with a sash. She added strappy black stiletto heels and accessorized with large brown designer shades

Lovely lady: She pairedher suit with strappy black stiletto heels and accessorized with large brown designer shades

Simply stunning: She wore her brunette tresses down as she accentuated her evergreen looks with complementary make-up

Kaia donned an olive green suit featuring large gold buttons and a mini skirt with knee-high black leather booties.

She accessorized with black rounded shades and a matching small leather bag with gold detailings.

Kaia has been busy making a name for herself on the runway as she rocked the catwalks at New York, Milan, and Paris fashion weeks last month.

Making moves: Kaia donned an olive green suit featuring large gold buttons and a mini skirt with knee-high black leather booties

Up and coming: She accessorized with black rounded shades and a matching small leather bag with gold detailings

Bonding time: The mother and daughter duo looked happy to attend the event together

Keeping it cool: The family members were seen leaving the event together

Big fans: They each carried out the new issue of Vogue featuring Rihanna on the cover which still has yet to be released

Watch your step: Cindy kept talking to her daughter as they descended down the steps

Moving on: The mother and daughter are staples at high fashion events

Before the madness of strutting several shows at several different city's fashion weeks, Kaia rang in her 18th birthday.

She attended her New York City party in a strappy black leather dominatrix look by Versace.

Kaia was the spitting image of her supermodel mom, who donned a similar iconic look in the early '90s.

Happy birthday: Before the madness of strutting several shows at several different city's fashion weeks, Kaia rang in her 18th birthday
description: A little R&R was in order as earlier in the day they'd taken part in the Vogue: Forces Of Fashion event at Spring Studios in Tribeca.
